name: Adetunwase Adenle
description: Adetunwase Adenle is a Nigerian Fine Art Teacher, artist, brand expert and mentor who teaches in the slums and the only Nigerian citizen who has four Guinness World Records to his name.

name: Monka Cilmi
description: Born in Italy and living in the UK, Monika is a professional artist, author, and transformational life coach with a strong spiritual connection with Japan and its culture.
